name: portfolio-project
description: This is a website for the fictional theme park from the film Jurassic Park.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run setup && npm run usemin-mainfolder && npm run copyfonts && npm run imagemin && npm run copyimages && npm run copy-html-folders && npm run copy-index.md
scripts.usemin-mainfolder: usemin index.html -d docs --htmlmin -o docs/index.html && usemin privacy-policy.html -d docs --htmlmin -o docs/privacy-policy.html
scripts.copyimages: copyfiles Jurassic_Park_logo_no_words.ico docs && copyfiles img/** docs
scripts.copy-html-folders: copyfiles park-info/** docs && copyfiles things-to-do/** docs && copyfiles things-to-see/** docs && copyfiles tickets/** docs

author: Sean Mussack
